analysis.key_quote: This rule will make it easier for talented, principled, ethical employees to be removed for political reasons to facilitate the gutting of our civil service and the destruction of our long-standing institutions.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and the potential removal of ethical employees for political reasons, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and due process rights.
